title: OnYourFit
about: This application is designed to assist hikers find the best trail  around you or across the continent.

title: Weather_App
about: A simple weather app tha uses a third-party API to display the weather today and the next five days on the City of your choice arround the world.

title: Coding Quiz
about: One of the first applications. Is a series of questions dinamically generated and score keeping records on local storage.

title: Avail
about: Avail is a peer to peer tutoring resource that brings students of all subjects together to learn and grow.

title: My Google Books
about: React-based Google Books Search app. Where the users can save books to review or purchase later.
